titleStmt.title: A treatise of the perpetuall visibilitie, and succession of the true church in all ages
titleStmt.author: Abbot, George, 1562-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humfrey Louunes, for Robert Milbourne,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Abbot, Abp. of Canterbury, by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
